Uses of Class
org.hibernate.validator.engine.ValidationContext

Packages that use ValidationContext
org.hibernate.validator.engine Implementations for the core interfaces of JSR-303. 
org.hibernate.validator.metadata Implementations of the Bean Validation metadata interfaces as well as Hibernate Validator specific meta data classes. 
 

Uses of ValidationContext in org.hibernate.validator.engine
 

Subclasses of ValidationContext in org.hibernate.validator.engine
 class MethodValidationContext<T>
          A ValidationContext implementation which creates and manages violations of type MethodConstraintViolation.
 class StandardValidationContext<T>
          A ValidationContext implementation which creates and manages violations of type ConstraintViolation.
